title: Candy Class - explain why will not compile

content.question: Which of the following changes can be made so that access to the class is constrained as intended?

choices.label: Changing the public designation to private in line 1
Changing the class header in line 1 to public class Candy()
Changing the public designation to private in lines 3 and 4
Changing the data type in line 4 from double to String

content.answer: Changing the public designation to private in lines 3 and 4

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
